description: Sends automated emergency alerts to nearby hospitals when critical/emergency conditions are detected, including patient summary and urgency level

example_response.patient_summary: 45-year-old male with acute chest pain and elevated troponin levels indicating possible myocardial infarction
example_response.alert_message: EMERGENCY ALERT: Patient presenting with acute myocardial infarction symptoms. Immediate cardiac intervention required. ETA to nearest facility: 8 minutes.
